g.text: Where does the yield come from?
Mint HERMES once per cycle (1 week)
Some time has to pass to get the rewards
Call the collect() with the Bribes contract as Recipient
1000 Boost tokens, 1000 Votes tokens, 1000 Weight tokens
Hermes: Contract Interactions - PlantUML diagram | author: @kamilchmielu
- Tokens supplied to the UniV3 pool
